author: rb:ez.no
msg: - Added named parameters for the Custom Functions.
- PHP 5.2 is now needed, due to some bugs in the reflection classes.

author: as:ez.no
msg: - Do not parse the Content-Type header when returned by top(), as it throws
a notice for "multipart/related" (because the multipart object cannot be
created due to missing the body).

author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Fix newlines for Windows test files.

author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Adjusted test suite according to new file locations.
